posts.title: Post example 2
posts.body: In the Pages documentation, we’ve explained that Next.js has two forms of pre-rendering: Static Generation and Server-side Rendering. In this page, we’ll talk in depth about data fetching strategies for each case.

posts.title: Post example 3
posts.body: If you export an async function called getStaticProps from a page, Next.js will pre-render this page at build time using the props returned by getStaticProps.
